headline: Fortinet Expands Share Buyback Program by $1B: Buy Now or Hold?

headline: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: Chipotle Mexican Grill and Fortinet

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Fortinet (FTNT) Expanding Its Share Buyback Program by $1 Billion
summary: On August 21, 2025, Fortinet’s board approved a US$1 billion increase to its share repurchase program, raising the total authorization to US$9.25 billion and extending the buyback window through February 2027. This enlarged buyback program underscores Fortinet’s focus on capital flexibility, offering the potential to enhance shareholder value through active management of its equity base. We’ll explore how this expanded share repurchase program could influence Fortinet’s investment outlook...
